text.p: Let's go back to [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline] and recall a few facts.

If a list of vectors in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline] has [mathjaxinline]k[/mathjaxinline] vectors with [mathjaxinline]k<n[/mathjaxinline], is it possible for the list to be linearly independent?
Is it possible for the list to span [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline]?

font.p: We have shown in previous sections that [mathjaxinline]k[/mathjaxinline] vectors in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline] cannot span [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline] if [mathjaxinline]k<n[/mathjaxinline].
